forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Patreon Thanks!

comments.text: Hi everyone! Update 160.27 (you're on [version]) shows a new patron credits page at the back of the Friends dialog!
To support Anyland, you can make a monthly pledge (starts at $1): patreon.com/anyland   Thank you!
Also, Update 161.1: We fixed an issue with the tweezer tool on the Vive/ Windows Mixed Reality! Thx Zid!
... and Line-breaking names in two is fixed in the new Patron dialog! Thx Nic!
Update 161.1: Welcome to our new Patrons, now also showing in the credits! ~~~ Saf ~~~ SirDesh ~~~ Yoofaloof ~~~ Thank you!
Update: All patreons are now also shown at anyland.com !

thread.latestCommentText: Update: All patreons are now also shown at anyland.com !
